name: Twice Augmented Hellspinner Shock Cannon
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The Notum Amplification Coil drops in Alien Playfields and can be used for various tradeskill processes. #L "Notum Amplification Coil" "257963" #L "Augmented Hellspinner Shock Cannon" "201939" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Notum Amplification Coil + Augmented Hellspinner Shock Cannon = #L "Twice Augmented Hellspinner Shock Cannon" "257124" Skills: | 1250 CL |
